item.description:
@r3d1 wrote:

[quote=“I Reece I, post:1, topic:155062”]when i trade and put any item it changes to varrock armour .
also when i wear santa hat it wears as gloves :\ any help please.[/quote]

find the item id for the santa hat and add it to the hat section in your item.java.then compile then try to wear it again.

for the other part u got problems wit…sorryy cant help ya there if i havent been there
